version_description:
New feature: it is now possible to save and reuse the objects that you customized.
Fixed a bug in canceling the last action.
Big performance gain . Loading plans is now two times faster .
Optimizing 3D rendering, increased performance by 50%
iOS compatibility added 10.

Some bugs related to iCloud have been fixed.
Performances using iCloud have been greatly improved.

Wish you all a very Happy Holiday Season !
New look for a new 3D experience!
Thanks to our new amazing 3D graphics, you will get a more realistic rendering of your project. We improved lighting and added shadow to the 3D scene. Also, cotations are now perfectly visible in every situations.

The last but not least! No limit, now it is possible to move up and down all the openings

Bug fixes
Performance improvements
-Bug fixes

Because we care about you and your devices, we worked hard to reduce by more than 50% the size of our App. For ever more confort, we improved the overall performance and optimized the editing menus display.
New and more practical, it is now possible to send you plan in PDF format. Plan size and definition can now be HD and printed in very high quality.

•Bundle size optimization.
•Context bar during scales and rotations of furnishings is now hidden.
•The Edit button in the wall bar context no longer appears in 3D.
•Added PDF in emails.

Because your comfort is important, now when you visit, decorate and personalize your interior in 3D view, a Touchpad and a Joystick will allow you to move easily, and to be more precise.
No more fumbling, thanks to the improvement of the object selection.
Improvement of preview display of the objects, correction of various bugs and improved performance.

Summer is coming soon ! Desires to shake your interior? ;)
For this Keyplan 3D has optimized its functionalities to make your use always easier and your projects even more beautiful.

***Your opinions***
Your suggestions and comments are valuable and do not hesitate to share them with us! They allow us to improve the application and to better answer your expectations ;), then do not hesitate to share them by writing to us on contact@keyplan3d.com.
Thank you for your confidence !

As you were all asking for, you can now share your creations via Twitter.
And to make your experience even easier, you can now create rooms by moving a wall's end point.
Also for your confort we've made Keyplan 3D the fastest, the lightest and the most robust home design's application on the market.

As you were all asking for, you can now share your creations via Twitter.
And to make your experience even easier, you can now create rooms by moving a wall's end point.
Also for your confort we've made Keyplan 3D the fastest, the lightest and the most robust home design's application on the market.

- Hotfix added for saved files.

- Hotfix for plan Import into Keyplan 3D while in Local mode.

As you were all asking for, you can now share your creations via Twitter.
And to make your experience even easier, you can now create rooms by moving a wall's end point.
Also for your confort we've made Keyplan 3D the fastest, the lightest and the most robust home design's application on the market.

Do you want to have new objects to decorate your interior ?
Well, the wait is over, you can now get them thanks to the new shop.

In this new version you can now enter values directly on the keyboard to edit your furniture and wall dimensions.
The wall dimensions limitations are now removed.
Also you can share a special link from Keyplan 3D to recommend to your friends to buy Keyplan 3D, and you will be rewarded with an exclusive object's pack.
And last but not least we have greatly improved object's picking.

In this new version you can now enter values directly on the keyboard to edit your furniture and wall dimensions.
The wall dimensions limitations are now removed.
Also you can share a special link from Keyplan 3D to recommend to your friends to buy Keyplan 3D, and you will be rewarded with an exclusive object's pack.
And last but not least we have greatly improved object's picking.

* IN THIS NEW VERSION *

- A new free object pack is now available.
- Performance improvements.
- Interface improvements.
- Bug fixes.

* PREVIOUSLY *

- You can now enter values directly on the keyboard to edit your furniture and wall dimensions.
- The wall dimensions limitations are now removed.
- You can share a special link from Keyplan 3D to recommend to your friends to buy Keyplan 3D, and you will be rewarded with an exclusive object's pack.
- We have greatly improved object's picking.

* IN THIS NEW VERSION *

- iCould improvements.
- Performance improvements.
- Interface improvements.
- Bug fixes.

* IN THE PREVIOUS VERSION *

- You can now directly export a PDF file by mail.
- Performance improvements.
- Interface improvements.
- Bug fixes.

* IN THIS NEW VERSION *
- Performance improvements.
- Bug fixes.

* IN THIS NEW VERSION *
Plan importation. It is now possible to import a picture of your plan inside Keyplan 3D. You will be able to create your 3D structure in no time !
Check the option menu to access this brand new feature.
Imported plan can be rotated, zoomed in and out and scaled according to your needs.

Hotfix.

* IN THIS NEW VERSION *
Plan importation. It is now possible to import a picture of your plan inside Keyplan 3D. You will be able to create your 3D structure in no time !
Check the option menu to access this brand new feature.
Imported plan can be rotated, zoomed in and out and scaled according to your needs.

- Windows and doors are now realistically placed on the chosen side of the wall.
- Measure in 3D can be seen through the building structure when selected to improve readability.
- The furnishing dimensions are not correctly displayed in 3D.
- Improved measures display. The measures will always be displayed the right side now. They could be upside down.
- Improved readability in 2D to distinguish door and window. Door are now colored with the ground color.
- Optimized windows and doors placement with better memory management and smooth movement.
- Rectangular room will display width and depth under their name for better readability.
- Removed redundant measures for more readability.
- Fixed a bug when measures on each side of an opening could disappear.
- Improved undo redo with keyboard input. Undo will return back to the first edition and not on each number typing.
- Improve loading time of Keyplan and size of KPL files.
- Fixed a bug, where some part of the wall could disappear in some rare circumstances.
- Windows cotations are now displayed on both side of the wall.
- Moving a window or a door close the wall border do not destroy the wall internal faces.
- When a window is slightly larger than a wall, there will be an auto-resize to let the window be placed correctly.
- Renaming a room is now done in a popup window to make this step easier.

This is the most ambitious update until now with a complete engine and interface redesign. 
The result is :
- A full display compatibility with the new iPhones and iPads and the upcoming ones. 
- We've added universal sharing so that you can share with any app your creation.
- File loading is now 10x faster than the previous version. 
- App size is reduced by 35%
- Memory footprint is reduced by 30%
- PDF display has been improved for better readability
- Wrong login and password in the shop is now correctly managed
- Room renaming bug is now fixed
- Measurements layout optimized on the pdf file export
iCloud drive is now available. All your files available from all your devices.

Direct sharing using Airdrop is now supported while app is running
Fixed a file format difference between iPad and iPhone, sharing is now automatic.
iCloud is now supporting every last features of iOS.
Scroll on creation is now working properly.
Image previews are now automatically generated.
Fixed touchpad not visible on start.
Disabled or invalid documents fixed.

Various bug fixes and improvements
Direct sharing using Airdrop is now supported while app is running
Fixed a file format difference between iPad and iPhone, sharing is now automatic.
iCloud is now supporting every last features of iOS.
Scroll on creation is now working properly.
Image previews are now automatically generated.
Fixed touchpad not visible on start.
Disabled or invalid documents fixed.

We keep improving Keyplan 3D with our regular updates.
- Dark mode is now correctly displayed
- Renamed "favorite" to "duplicate" button for custom furniture
- In-App purchase updated
- Various bug fixes and improvements
